thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: fugde08
title: Great location
text: The reception area is beautiful and all the staff are really friendly and the hotel is in a fantastic part of NY. The wifi is a bit annoying though it keeps locking you out, so you have to keep entering your room number and surname to regain access. Also, the lifts are extremely slow and the room we stayed the skirting boards were very dusty. Having said that overall it's a fantastic hotel, and we'll probably stay here again.
